comment.author: 68512117@N02
comment._content:
B-24D  41-24288 "LITTLE FLOWER"  14AF  308BG  375BS
After its combat career, this aircraft was transferred to the Air Transport Command (ATC) and used to ferry cargo and gasoline from India to China. It was used until suffering a takeoff accident at Ye-U Burma on 13-Jan-1945.
